about_the_game:
Ultimate Unlock Bundle contains the following items:

Unlock All Voices
All voices for avatars are unlocked. (JP audio only)

Unlock All Physical Parts
All physical parts for avatars are unlocked.

Unlock All Clothing
All clothing can be worn regardless of job conditions.

Full Gallery Unlock
All scenes in the gallery are unlocked.
detailed_description:
Ultimate Unlock Bundle contains the following items:

Unlock All Voices
All voices for avatars are unlocked. (JP audio only)

Unlock All Physical Parts
All physical parts for avatars are unlocked.

Unlock All Clothing
All clothing can be worn regardless of job conditions.

Full Gallery Unlock
All scenes in the gallery are unlocked.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 512Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 1GB RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: Ultimate Unlock Bundle contains the following items: Unlock All Voices, Unlock All Physical Parts, Unlock All Clothing, Full Gallery Unlock
